job.description:
If you are a PLC Engineer with experience, please read on!
Operating for over 30 years, we are the industry leading robot automation engineering, manufacturing company. Our headquarters is located in Michigan with over 100 highly trained/ experienced automation and controls engineers. We work diligently and collaboratively with clients to provide with the highest level of automation systems worldwide.
We service over 600 clients and we are rapidly growing! Due to our successful growth we are looking for a PLC/Controls Engineer to join our team!
What You Need for this Position
What's In It for You
We offer a very competitive base
Strong bonus structure
Full benefits

So, if you are a PLC Engineer with experience, please apply today!
Looking forward to receiving your resume through our website and going over the position with you. Clicking apply is the best way to apply, but you may also:
Wendy.Alvarado@CyberCoders.com
Wendy Alvarado - Sr. Executive Recruiter - CyberCoders
Applicants must be authorized to work in the U.S.
All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, disability, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law.
